channel.title: Umm i got this error while coding
channel.description:
well im coding my own server finally lol and i got this area while erase all the pop up menus in client.java that a prevous owner added. here is the error
C:\Documents and Settings\Owner\My Documents\RS2\ZammyRunescape Source\client.java:4522: illegal start of expression public boolean playerHasItemAmount(int itemID, int itemAmount) { ^
plz help me fix this[br][size=1]Posted on: August 20, 2007, 01:04:13 PM[/size][hr]help plz? [br][size=1]Posted on: August 20, 2007, 01:16:04 PM[/size][hr]omgsh can someone help me with this error, im not sure what to do about it. Im not an advance coder, basically teaching myself and i just need some help

		playerItemAmountCount = 0;
{

			if (playerItems[i] == itemID+1)

{
				playerItemAmountCount = playerItemsN[i];
}
